name: Cassandra
description: A quick reference of Apache's Cassandra database

KEYSPACE.key: CREATE ( KEYSPACE | SCHEMA )  keyspace_name WITH REPLICATION = map AND DURABLE_WRITES = ( true | false )
KEYSPACE.val: Define a new keyspace and its replica placement strategy.
Connect the client session to a keyspace.

KEYSPACE.key: ALTER ( KEYSPACE | SCHEMA ) keyspace_name WITH REPLICATION = map| ( WITH DURABLE_WRITES = ( true | false )) AND ( DURABLE_WRITES = ( true | false))
KEYSPACE.val: Change property values of a keyspace.

USER.key: CREATE USER user_name WITH PASSWORD 'password' ( NOSUPERUSER | SUPERUSER )
ALTER USER user_name WITH PASSWORD 'password' ( NOSUPERUSER | SUPERUSER )
LIST permission_name PERMISSION| ( LIST ALL PERMISSIONS ) ON resource OF user_name NORECURSIVE
USER.val: List permissions granted to a user.
List existing users and their superuser status.

TABLE.key: CREATE TABLE keyspace_name.table_name ( column_definition, column_definition, ...) WITH property AND property ...

TABLE.val: Modify the column metadata of a table.

TABLE.key: SELECT select_expression FROM keyspace_name.table_name WHERE relation AND relation ... ORDER BY ( clustering_column ( ASC | DESC )...) LIMIT n ALLOW FILTERING
TABLE.val: Retrieve data from a Cassandra table.

TABLE.key: UPDATEkeyspace_name.table_name USING option AND option SET assignment, assignment, ... WHERE row_specification
DELETE column_name, ... | ( column_name term )  FROM keyspace_name.table_name USING TIMESTAMP integer WHERE row_specification
TABLE.val: Removes entire rows or one or more columns from one or more rows.
Remove all data from a table.

TABLE.key: INSERT INTO keyspace_name.table_name ( column_name, column_name...) VALUES ( value, value ... ) USING option AND option

INDEX.key: CREATE CUSTOM INDEX index_name ON keyspace_name.table_name ( column_name ) (USING class_name) (WITH OPTIONS = map)
INDEX.val: Define a new index on a single column of a table.
